title: Say "Cheese"
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 107 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 360L
description: How is cheese made? Say "Cheese" provides students with a step-by-step guide to making cheese using basic ingredients and tools. Simple instructions and detailed photographs support student learning. The book can also be used to teach students how to visualize to understand the text and to sequence events.
reviewWords: bubbles, burner, curd, drain, strainer, whey
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Determine the sequence of events
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words help, make, put
